pacman

Class Pacman

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.Pacman

  • public class Pacman
extends java.lang.Object
    The class of pacman, which creates the object of pacman, updates the object of pacman and draws the object of pacman

      • Pacman

        public Pacman(GridReadCreate grc,
              int numLives,
              java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] L,
              java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] U,
              java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] R,
              java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] D)
        Constructor for pacman class, initiate pacman object
        Parameters:
        grc - GridReadCreate Object
        numLives - Number of lives remaining
        L - Left facing pacman image
        U - Up facing pacman image
        R - Right facing pacman image
        D - Down facing pacman image

                               int[] ghostPosY,
                               int ghostNum)
        Update the pacman object's position
        Parameters:
        ghostPosX - Array of X positions of the ghosts
        ghostPosY - Array of Y positions of the ghosts
        ghostNum - Numebr of ghosts
        Returns:
        If the pacman is still alive, false means not dead

        state - pacman facing information

      • updateLives

        boolean updateLives(int[] ghostsX,
                    int[] ghostsY,
                    int ghostNum)
        Updates the remaining lives of the pacman.
        Parameters:
        ghostsX - Array of X positions of the ghosts
        ghostsY - Array of Y positions of the ghosts
        ghostNum - Number of remaining ghosts
        Returns:
        If the pacman is still alive, false means not dead
